author: Staff Reporter
text:
Principal District Sessions Judge of Thoothukudi N. Rajasekar on Friday sentenced a murder accused to undergo life imprisonment. According to prosecution, P. Murugan (56) of Meenakshipuram, Pasuvanthanai was accused of murdering P. Kumar (42), his relative and neighbour over a dispute concerning half a cent of land. Both quarrelled often over the land. Finally, Murugan sought Kumar to handover the land to him. Since Kumar refused to accept his demand, Murugan assaulted him with a wooden log.

The incident occurred on North Street of Meenakshipuram on June 18, 2012. Pasuvanthanai police filed a case following the incident. Besides, fine of Rs.1,000 was imposed on the accused.
title: Life sentence for murder
